meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the earth or its inhabitants.
meanings.sent1: The terrestrial plants need soil to grow.
meanings.sent2: Many animals have adapted to terrestrial life.
meanings.sent3: The terrestrial creatures had a picnic under the open sky.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was as deep as the roots of a terrestrial tree.
meanings.sent5: The terrestrial landscape was painted with vibrant colors of nature.

meanings.definition: A living organism that inhabits the earth.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the behavior of a terrestrial in its natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special section for terrestrials like turtles and rabbits.
meanings.sent3: The little terrestrial scurried across the forest floor, looking for food.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a terrestrial exploring a new world when she visited the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the diversity of terrestrials in different ecosystems.
